folder: Frankfort Street & Pearl Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Frankfort Street, west from, but not including Pearl Street. Brooklyn Bridge under-structure shown on the right.

September 7, 1927.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Dover Street & Pearl Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Dover Street, at Pearl Street. The view shows the Franklin Square Station of the Second and Third Aves., Elevated, directly under the Manhattan Approach to the Brooklyn Bridge. The tower of the Municipal Building, is seen in the distant background.

March 27, 1931.

P. L. Sperr.

folder: Pearl Street & Dover Street, Manhattan, NY
text:
Pearl Street, west side, south from Dover Street, and showing the Franklin Square Station of the Second and Third Aves., Elevated. Steel beams silhouetted across the top, are part of the Brooklyn Bridge Approach.  Buildings observed in the distance, are the City Service and Bank of Manhattan.
June 24, 1933.
P.L. Sperr.
Neg. #4080

folder: 340 Pearl Street - Dover Street, Manhattan, NY
title: 340 Pearl Street - Dover Street
